title: ‘Everything’ thrown at Dezi Freeman manhunt; the staggering truth about wage inequality; and Marles-Hegseth meeting confusion

title: Porepunkah shooting: Victoria police ‘throwing everything’ at manhunt in ‘severe weather’ for shooting suspect
summary: Authorities are searching a rural area for a heavily armed suspect linked to the deaths of two police officers. Despite extensive efforts, the suspect remains unaccounted for. The police continue to comb through the surrounding bushland for any signs of the individual.
